name: School Bus Simulator Game 2017
description:
School bus driving simulator 2017 free: school kids pick & drop duty simulation game
Get ready for the early morning bus rush. School Kids are waiting to be picked up, to get dropped to their primary and high schools. Dropping off school kids on time is the challenge for any school bus driver in this school bus driving simulator. So, start your engine, get on the road and take your coach to school! School Bus Driving Simulator is developed especially for ambitious drivers who feel they are ready to do the job of city School Bus Driver. This school bus driving game is a little unique in the sense that you required to perform your duties in big city and industrial area. Sometimes you have to start before the sunrise to drop the Industrial workers and rush back for your school duties. In this driving school game you do not only transport kids from home to school in the morning, you have to pick them from school and drop them home as well in the afternoon. 

Select the bus and drive through the city. Go ahead towards front seat as the school bus driver, and pick up passenger kids and drop them ahead to their destinations in your school bus. Consider yourself as the crazy school bus driver; in charge of the public bus transport, all you have to do is to give your school kids a safe and sound drive round the city, pick and drop them to their destinations in this bus driver simulator game. You have to avoid the collisions with the traffic vehicles in order to pick and drop the school students safe and sound. School bus driving simulator is a game for everyone that would like to keep those driving skills up to date, you need to practice everything from parking, reversing and use your mental skills to keep calm. Their safety is in your hands! Drive safe and drive on time! 

Are you ready for an enjoyable adventure? Your mission is to safely pick and drop the kids by driving your school bus! All the great animations and the driving thrill make this City school Bus Driving Simulator as one of the best bus driving Parking games of 2017.




FEATURES

- School Bus Driving Experience
 - Explore the Big City Environment

 - A Unique Concept for School Going Kids
 - Amazing Gameplay with HD Graphics
 - Play as a Virtual Bus Driver

 - Animated school kids idle, walking, entering/exiting the bus
